election_record.label: New York 1803 State Senate, Middle District

overview.note: Ebenezer Ford, James Brett and Samuel Ford are amalgamations of two candidates.

sub_unit.name: Columbia
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 17 and 31 lists 1151 votes for Robert Johnston and 1144 votes for Joshua H. Brett.
Joshua H. Brett received 1 vote as Joshua Brett.

sub_unit.name: Delaware
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), June 3, lists 568 votes for Robert Johnston.
The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 6, and The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 31, list 520 votes for James Burt.
Joshua H. Brett received 1 vote as Joshua Brett.

sub_unit.name: Kortright
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), May 21, lists 144 votes for Joshua H. Brett.

sub_unit.name: Amenia
sub_unit.note: Joshua H. Brett received 1 vote as Joshua Brett.

sub_unit.name: Beekman
sub_unit.note: Joshua H. Brett received 4 votes as Joshua Brett.

sub_unit.name: Clinton
sub_unit.note: Joshua H. Brett received 2 votes as Joshua Brett.

sub_unit.name: Franklin
sub_unit.note: Joshua H. Brett received 1 vote as Joshua Brett.

sub_unit.name: Northeast
sub_unit.note: Robert Johnston received 1 vote as Robert John.

sub_unit.name: Washington
sub_unit.note: James Burt received 1 vote as Jam. Burt.

sub_unit.name: Greene
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 20, 31, and June 3; and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 6, list 431 votes for Ebenezer Foote.
Joshua H. Brett received 7 votes as Joshua Brett, 5 votes as Joshua A. Brett and 1 vote as Josiah H. Brett.
Ebenezer Ford received 1 vote as Ebenezer Fort.

sub_unit.name: Orange
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 1, 31, and June 3; and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 6, list 1194 votes for Robert Johnston.
The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 3, lists 1203 votes for James Burt.
The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 17, 31, and June 3; and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 6, list 60 votes for Jacob Ford and 77 votes for Ebenezer Foote.
Joshua H. Brett received 2 vote as Joshua Brett and 1 vote as Joshua Brutt.
Robert Johnston received 1 vote as Robert R. Johnston.
Ebenezer Ford received 1 vote as Ebenezer Fort.

sub_unit.name: Ulster
sub_unit.note: Robert Johnston received 1 vote as Robert H. Johnson.
Joshua H. Brett received 1 vote as Joshua Brett, 1 vote as Joshua Britt, 1 vote as Joshua A. Brett and 1 vote as Josiah H. Breet.
The Albany Register (Albany, NY), June 3, lists 783 votes for Robert Johnston.
The American Citizen (New York, NY), May 18; the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), May 21 and June 6; and The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 13 and June 3, list 465 votes for Samuel Towner.
The American Citizen (New York, NY), May 18; the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), May 21 and June 6; and The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 13 and 31, list 752 votes for Joshua H. Brett.
The Albany Register (Albany, NY), June 3, lists 776 votes for Joshua H. Brett.

sub_unit.name: Thompson
sub_unit.note: "Not returned in due time by the Inspectors. This town had given a majority of 13 for the Federal ticket." American Citizen (New York, NY), May 18. 1803.

election_record.reference: Original Election Books. Dutchess County Historian, Poughkeepsie.
